name: Faolain's Blossom
description: <c=@flavor>"Here at last, dearheart. Are you prepared to join me?" - Grand Duchess Faolain</c>

name: Glorious Victor's Armor Box
description: Contains a choice of any Glorious Hero's armor.

name: Glorious Armor Box
description: This armor box contains unique armor skins, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers.

name: Commander's Compendium
description: Double-click to use. Unlock the ability to become a Commander.

name: Red Commander's Compendium
description: Double-click to use. Unlocks the account-wide ability to become a commander and the red commander icon.

name: Purple Commander's Compendium
description: Double-click to use. Unlocks the account-wide ability to become a commander and the purple commander icon.

name: Yellow Commander's Compendium
description: Double-click to use. Unlocks the account-wide ability to become a commander and the yellow commander icon.

name: Superior Rune of the Trapper
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Gain 3 seconds of stealth and superspeed after using a trap skill.

name: Superior Sigil of Cleansing
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Remove 3 conditions when swapping to this weapon in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Cruelty
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Gain a charge of +10 ferocity each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

name: Superior Rune of Radiance
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Boon Duration; increase the duration of auras you grant by +33%.

name: Superior Sigil of Incapacitation
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Cripple a foe for 2 seconds after striking from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Rune of Evasion
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 ferocity; gain swiftness for 6 seconds after evading an attack. <c=@reminder> Cooldown: 1 second.</c>

name: Siege Disabler
description:
Unpack a siege disabler. This trick disables the use of enemy siege equipment for 35 seconds and piloted golems for 20 seconds. Costs 10 supply to deploy. Can be blocked.
Deployment Range: 1200
Effect Radius: 300

name: Foil-Wrapped Candy
description:
<c=@flavor>The sugar in this candy will go straight to your head.</c>
Consuming this item leaves a shiny foil candy wrapper, which is highly prized by skritt.

details.description: Grants a random boost that stacks duration if the same boost is awarded more than once.

name: Shiny Foil Candy Wrapper
description:
"Shiny pieces of foil! Make something nice, maybe. You be friend, find for me?"
—Collector Terksli in Lion's Arch

name: Ghostly Mail Courier
description: Unlocks the ability for characters on your account to customize the way they send mail to other players and receive game mail.

name: Magic Carpet
description:
Travel. Double-click to equip a bundle that changes how you move around the world.

Using this item automatically equips it while running outside of combat. The effect can be removed by using the Stop Riding skill or by double-clicking this item again.

name: Oontz's Necklace of the Pumpkin
description: This necklace shimmers with strange, spectral luminescence.

name: Endless Bottle of Batwing Brew
description: Double-click to transform into a swarm of bats.

name: Bloody Prince's Toy Chest
description: Double-click to unlock the Bloody Prince's Toybox collection.

name: Mini Gwynefyrdd
description: This peaceful spirit seeks to protect children and innocents from harm. Also, she likes snuggling.

name: Mini Zuzu, Cat of Darkness
description: A feline familiar frequently found following the footpaths of fallen foes.

name: Recipe: Pumpkin Oil
description: Double-click to unlock this consumable recipe.

details.name: Ghoul's Blessing
details.description:
Reviving an ally grants Ghoul's Grasp to both you and your revived ally.
Ghoul's Grasp increases condition damage, precision, and toughness.
+10% Experience from Kills
+30% Magic Find

details.name: Feline Blessing
details.description:
Reviving an ally grants Feline Fury to both you and your revived ally.
Feline Fury increases all attributes by a small amount.
+10% Experience from Kills
+30% Magic Find

name: Recipe: Crystallized Nougat
description: Double-click to unlock this consumable recipe.

name: Polyluminescent Undulating Refractor (Green)
description: Double-click to apply this to a trinket.

buff.description:
+12 Condition Damage
+12 Precision
+12 Toughness
+12 Power
+12 Vitality
+12 Healing Power
+12 Ferocity

details.name: Pumpkin's Blessing
details.description:
Reviving an ally grants Pumpkin Prowess to both you and your revived ally.
Pumpkin Prowess increases power, toughness, and vitality.
+10% Experience from Kills
+30% Magic Find

name: Polyluminescent Undulating Refractor (Orange)
description: Double-click to apply this to a trinket.

buff.description:
+12 Condition Damage
+12 Precision
+12 Toughness
+12 Power
+12 Vitality
+12 Healing Power
+12 Ferocity

name: Oontz's Necklace of the Cat
description: This necklace shimmers with strange, spectral luminescence.

name: Hexed Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Polyluminescent Undulating Refractor (Black)
description: Double-click to apply this to a trinket.

buff.description:
+12 Condition Damage
+12 Precision
+12 Toughness
+12 Power
+12 Vitality
+12 Healing Power
+12 Ferocity

name: Oontz's Necklace of the Ghoul
description: This necklace shimmers with strange, spectral luminescence.

name: Vial of Maize Balm
description: Throw a bottle of balm to transform ambient creatures into candy corn elementals.

name: Bottle of Batwing Brew
description: Double-click to transform into a swarm of bats.

name: Recipe: Batwing Brew
description: Double-click to unlock this transform tonic recipe.

name: Recipe: Maize Balm
description: Double-click to learn this recipe.

name: Recipe: Sharpening Skull
description: Double-click to unlock this consumable recipe.

name: Old Pillowcase
description: Double-click to unlock the Tricks and Treats collection.

name: Mini Candy Corn Ghoulemental
description: Left exposed to spectral emanations, normal-seeming candy corn takes on unusual properties.

name: Unopened Endless Bottle of Batwing Brew
description: Double-click to transform into a swarm of bats.

name: Child's Trick-or-Treat Bag
description: Double-click to open.

name: Haunted Gramophone
description: Click to equip and use this Halloween themed Haunted Gramophone.

name: Candy Corn Gobbler
description: Use this and 3 of your candy corn for a festive Halloween transform or a random boost.

name: Log-r-Tron
description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

name: Reap-r-Tron
description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

name: Mine-r-Tron
description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

name: Noble Count Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Replica Job-o-Tron Backpack
description:
This backpack cover comes with a simple back strap for ease of wearing if you don't have another back-slot item.
Double-click to unpack.

name: Candy Corn Gobbler Pack
description: Click on this item to receive 15 candy corn and the Candy Corn Gobbler.

name: Replica Job-o-Tron Backpack
description: Double-click to imbue another back-slot item's stats into this appearance (one-time ability).

description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous necromancer, Verata.</c>

name: Bag of Gear
description: Contains fine and masterwork gear.

name: Bandit Coin Purse
description: 20 Slots

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 6% of Your Healing Power
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 8% of Your Concentration
+10% Experience from Kills

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Expertise Equal to 3% of Your Precision
+10% Experience from kills

name: Recipe: Sinister Pearl Speargun
description: A recipe to make a Sinister Pearl Speargun

name: Recipe: Exquisite Charged Ambrite Jewel
description: A recipe to make an Exquisite Charged Ambrite Jewel. Charged Ambrite Jewelery recipes can be found in buried chests in the Silverwastes.

name: Recipe: Sinister Orichalcum Imbued Inscription
description: A recipe to make a Sinister Orichalcum Imbued Inscription.

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain 0.6% Increased Healing to Other Allies for Every 100 Healing Power
Gain 0.8% Increased Healing to Other Allies for Every 100 Concentration
+10% Experience from Kills

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Concentration Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Healing Power Equal to 3% of Your Precision
+10% Experience from Kills

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Power Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Ferocity Equal to 3% of Your Precision
+10% Experience from Kills

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Power Equal to 6% of Your Healing Power
Gain Power Equal to 8% of Your Concentration
+10% Experience from Kills
